author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this video and learn how to use light and camera vectors for stylized material outlines and effects. 

Visit the EDC for more on this tutorial: https://dev.epicgames.com/community/learning/tutorials/1m8K/unreal-engine-using-vectors-for-stylization

You can download the Stylized Octopus Plugin for free on Fab: https://www.fab.com/listings/198ccb23-5794-4c17-8190-40b57d7bdd81

Don’t miss the other episodes in our Animation Hub series—a collection of tutorials designed to get you up to speed with animation in Unreal Engine, fast: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZlv_N0_O1gYJvb49Ax6vJ25eLDT9bhAt

Want to learn more about animating in Unreal Engine? Take a look here: unrealengine.com/uses/animation

#Animation, #UnrealEngine, #CameraVector, #LightVector, #VFX, #StylizedRendering, #UE5
title: Using Vectors for Stylization | Unreal Engine Animation Hub

author: Unreal Engine
description: Happy New Year, everyone!  We have another collection of wonderful talks from Unreal Fest Stockholm!  We've put together a few talks that cover Animated Nanite Foliage in The Witcher 4 Unreal Engine 5 Tech Demo and the future of Nanite Foliage!
title: Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025 Collection - Animated Foliage in Witcher 4 & the Future of Nanite Foliage

author: Unreal Engine
description: The team use CARLA simulator for high fidelity Advanced Driver Assistance System(ADAS) simulation that includes testing of vehicle signals, camera data recording, safety application validation and more.
title: While at CES, check out the Unreal Engine powered CARLA simulator at the Elektrobit booth🚗
